hero.title: Authenticity of the Past
hero.titleHighlight: and the Fragrance of Gulf History
hero.subtitle: Learn about the oldest ancient civilizations, tour prestigious museums, and explore archaeological sites that tell the story of the Gulf through time

featuredSite.title: Site of the Week: Spring of
featuredSite.description: Visit an archaeological site dating back thousands of years, where you can see the remains of ancient civilizations and learn about the region's rich history. The site includes an interactive museum and specialized guides to enrich your experience.

calligraphy.title: Calligraphy and Decoration Arts
calligraphy.description: Discover the beauty of Arabic calligraphy and Islamic decorations that adorn mosques and historical palaces in the Gulf region.

shipBuilding.title: Traditional Shipbuilding
shipBuilding.description: Learn about the traditional wooden shipbuilding (Dhow) that Gulf sailors used for centuries in their trading voyages.

handicrafts.title: Heritage Handicrafts
handicrafts.description: Explore handicrafts such as weaving, pottery, and leather industries that reflect the skill of Gulf craftsmen.

museums.title: Art Museums
museums.description: Visit the finest art museums showcasing fine and contemporary arts.

exhibitions.title: Art Exhibitions
exhibitions.description: Enjoy diverse art exhibitions that combine authenticity and modernity.

culturalCenters.title: Cultural Centers
culturalCenters.description: Discover cultural centers offering workshops and artistic events.

traditionalArts.title: Traditional Arts
traditionalArts.description: Learn about folk arts and Gulf heritage music.

cta.title: Would you like to
cta.description: Book your cultural tour now and enjoy a unique experience that takes you on a journey through time to discover the heritage and culture of the Arabian Gulf.
